Heritrix fetches inline-material for all pages in scope - so embeds are 
fetched even though they are on different hosts/domains !

If you don't link this you should set max-trans-hops to zero and maybe 
experiment a little with the settings in the transitiveFilter that allow 
URI's that are possibly embeds (but crawler not absolutely sure)

best
Bjarne Andersen
